item.title: Async Python: Concurrency Without The Headaches
item.description: Presentation Overview # Recently, I had the opportunity to present a talk titled “Async Python: Concurrency Without The Headaches” at EuroPython 2025 alongside my colleague Mateusz Zaremba.
